fields.prompt: How do you know that the suspect was taken into custody and chared with a crime?

fields.error_warning_message: Location should be provided
Charge sheet date should be provided
Police case # should be provided
Human trafficking narrative should be provided
Date last contacted should be provided
There should be at least one court case
There should be at least one suspect
There should be at least one victim
There should be at least one timeline entry
Court Case should have at least one charge
Suspect arrest status should be provided
Suspect named in charge sheet should be provided
Suspect arrest date should be provided
Suspect charge verdict date should be provided
Suspect charge imprisonment period should be provided
Verdict should be entered
Should have attachment with option "Charge Sheet"
Should have attachment with option "Verdict" when there has been a verdict of "Conviction" or "Acquittal"
Legal status must be entered for each suspect charge
Case Summary must be populated
